LanguageData.RK_FakeEar.label: fake ear
LanguageData.RK_FakeEar.description: It's fake ear. In a ratkin society, big ears mean a lot.
LanguageData.RK_FakeTail.label: fake tail
LanguageData.RK_BionicTail.label: bionic tail
LanguageData.RK_BionicTail.description: An advanced artificial tail. It moves just like a real tail would and helps the user keep their balance.
